calf_stretches.name: Standing Calf Stretch
calf_stretches.description: Stand facing a wall with your hands against it. Step one foot back and keep it straight while bending the front knee. Lean forward slightly to feel the stretch in the calf of the back leg. Hold for 30 seconds and switch legs.

calf_stretches.name: Seated Calf Stretch
calf_stretches.description: Sit on the floor with your legs straight out in front of you. Loop a towel or strap around the ball of one foot and gently pull it towards you while keeping the leg straight. Hold for 30 seconds and switch legs.

calf_stretches.name: Downward-Facing Dog
calf_stretches.description: Start on your hands and knees, then lift your hips up and back, forming an inverted V-shape with your body. Press your heels towards the ground while keeping your back straight. Hold for 30 seconds.

calf_stretches.name: Calf Raise Stretch
calf_stretches.description: Stand on the edge of a step or curb with your heels hanging off. Slowly lower your heels below the level of the step until you feel a stretch in your calves. Hold for 15-30 seconds and then rise back up onto your toes.

calf_stretches.name: Wall Stretch
calf_stretches.description: Stand facing a wall with your hands against it at shoulder height. Step one foot back and keep it flat on the ground. Lean forward, keeping both heels on the ground, to feel the stretch in the calf of the back leg. Hold for 30 seconds and switch legs.
